name: Applied Systems Ltd.
description:
Since 1997 Applied Systems creates M2M and Business Process automation software.
Our experience and expertise is in M2M building powerful solutions including Test, Calibration, Configuration and Maintenance automation.
We have deep domain expertise in Data Acquisition and Process Visualization.
We develop native Mobile apps for industrial applications. New technologies emerge constantly, for example Augmented Reality. We work closely with our clients to harness these technologies to drive efficiency.
We have built a powerful test environment; Octopus which allows for rapid and accurate Software Functionality and Usability Testing.
These skills combined allow us to create software that automates and visualizes any business process from Sales to Service.
Contact us to learn how Applied Systems can solve your business needs.
